data.title: Philip K. Dick
data.meta_description: PKD - Free download as Open Office file (.odt), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Philip K. Dick was an American science fiction author known for exploring philosophical themes in novels dominated by altered states and questioning reality. Some of his most famous works adapted to film include Blade Runner, Total Recall, and Minority Report. He struggled financially throughout his career despite gaining recognition within science fiction. Dick explored themes of drug abuse, paranoia, and transcendental experiences in novels often drawing from his own life experiences.
